title: Blended Social Studies Curriculum Design Using a Quantum Learning Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Core social studies theories and proficiency in utilizing digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A course strengthening social studies curriculum design competencies by combining BYOD, real-time interaction, and asynchronous collaborative activities.

learning_goals: Apply the nine core elements of the Quantum Learning Framework (system characteristics, instructor roles, online-offline integration strategies, etc.) when designing social studies lessons in blended learning environments
Develop social studies lesson materials integrating an online real-time platform (Zoom) with a Learning Management System (LMS)
Design and operate formative assessment tools (quizzes, discussion analysis) effectively for large learner groups

resources: Digital Content Creation Tools (e.g., Canva, Google Docs)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
